mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as num, p.product_id, p.product_name, g.pgroup_name, p.barcode, p.price_in, p.price_out, s.standard_name, p.made_in from product p, product_group g, standards s where p.pgroup_id = g.pgroup_id and s.standard_id = p.standard_id) where num between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into Product ( product_id, product_name, pgroup_id, price_in, price_out, barcode, standard_id, made_in ) values( #{product_id}, #{product_name}, #{pgroup_id}, #{price_in}, #{price_out}, #{barcode}, #{standard_id}, #{made_in} )
mapper.select: select product_id, product_name from product where product_id LIKE #{word}
